text: Jonathan Antoni Gittens (22 January 1964 – 11 May 2019) was an English professional footballer. He played as a centre back. Gittens was born in Moseley, Birmingham. He started his career playing for Southampton. He played for Swindon Town from 1987 to 1991, making over 120 appearances for the club. He returned to Southampton in 1991. He later played for Middlesbrough, Portsmouth, Torquay United and Exeter City. He also managed non-league football teams after retiring from playing. Gittens died on 11 May 2019, at the age of 55. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League FA Cup FA Cup League Cup League Cup Other
